dict.string: Gotta love these baby blues. Pet me to help other cats everywhere!
Adorable 3 month old Fido arrived battered and weary via anonymous donation. Help him get his fluffy fur back!
What's that? You want to give free kibbles? Pet me to make it happen!
Look into my eyes. You will pet kitties and give kibbles to cats in need.
This smile is for you. When you pet me, kibbles go to kitties like me. Everybody wins!
Who can resist these eyes? You know you want to pet to give kibble!
Pick me! Ooh, pick me! Pet me to help feed other puppies today!
Relaxing in the sun, petting the perfect dog, giving free kibbles... what could be better?
You were looking for adorbs?! Here I am! Pet me and we'll help other puppies!
You cannot resist the puppy dog eyes. Pet me and give kibble. All puppies thank you.
